# About CCEA

The Civic and Citizenship Education Alliance (CCEA) is a strategic initiative of the Global Citizenship Foundation (GCF), dedicated to advancing civic education and democratic participation worldwide.

## Our Mission

To empower individuals and communities through comprehensive civic education, fostering active citizenship and democratic engagement across cultures and borders.

## Our Vision

A world where informed, engaged citizens actively participate in shaping democratic societies and addressing global challenges.
